attributes.action: introduce new legislation making all forms of occultism illegal in the UK  .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: That legislation is immediately introduced into the UK to criminalise  all forms of occultism and in particular witchcraft , satanism , voodoo practices which are at the moment all currently legal under current UK law . That a ban on all occultist symbolism be introduced into the UK .That the UK law make it an imprisonable offence for anyone to be involved in the black arts or it`s furtherance in any way .
